page.title: 04GATESHEAD: CHRISTIANITY
page.content: There are eighteen active churches and/or chapels in the area. They are divided as follows{-CHURCH OF ENGLAND :St. Ninian's, Lyndhurst. St. Helen's, Low Fell. St. John's, Low Fell. St. Thomas's, Eighton Banks. St. Alban's, Windy Nook.{ROMAN CATHOLIC:}St.Peters, Low Fell. St. Anne's, Harlow Green. St. Oswald's, Wrekenton.{BAPTIST: Durham Road, Low Fell{:UNITED REFORM: Denewell Ave,Low Fell. Cromer Ave, Low Fell.{METHODIST:}Stone Place, Windy Nook. Jubilee Ave, Eighton Banks. Sheriff's Highway,Sheriff's Hill. {OTHERS}:Mormon Church, Harlow Green. Christian Scientists, Harlow Green. Christian Brethren, Chowdene Chapel. Most churches provided Sunday services only. Some offer mid_week services. Catholic Churches have at least one daily mass.Joint Services occur.
